title: Carrie Lam
summary: Carrie Lam Cheng Yuet-ngor GBM GBS (Chinese: 林鄭月娥; Cantonese Yale: Làhm Jehng Yuht-ngòh; née Cheng, born 13 May 1957) is a Hong Kong politician serving as the fourth and current Chief Executive of Hong Kong since 2017 and Chairperson of the Committee for Safeguarding National Security since 2020.[4] She served as Chief Secretary for Administration from 2012 to 2017 and Secretary for Development from 2007 to 2012.
